properties.location: Petts Wood Road, Petts Wood, Orpington BR5
properties.shortDescription: Charming three-bedroom family home steps from Petts Wood station.
properties.description: Discover the perfect blend of charm and contemporary living in this attractive three-bedroom semi-detached home, just 0.5 miles from Petts Wood station. Spanning 1,250 sq ft, the property features a spacious entrance hall leading to an expansive open-plan living area. The heart of the home is a modern kitchen with quartz countertops and premium appliances. Upstairs offers three generous bedrooms and a luxurious family bathroom with a rainfall shower. The master suite includes bespoke wardrobes overlooking a landscaped rear garden with a private patio. With a dedicated home office, guest WC, and off-street parking for two cars, this home meets every modern need. Ideally located near top-rated schools and woodland walks, it is a rare find in a sought-after neighborhood.

properties.shortDescription: Modern two-bedroom garden flat with contemporary open-plan living.
properties.description: Presented in immaculate order, this stunning garden flat offers exceptional living across 950 sq ft. The property features two spacious double bedrooms, including a master with a sleek en-suite, alongside a pristine family bathroom. The highlight is the bright, open-plan living area where a state-of-the-art kitchen flows seamlessly into the lounge. Bi-fold doors open onto a private, south-facing patio extending into lush communal gardens, creating a perfect indoor-outdoor lifestyle. Additional benefits include underfloor heating, a utility cupboard, and secure video entry. Located on desirable Crofton Road, this flat combines peace with convenience, sitting just a short stroll from Orpington’s bustling high street and excellent transport links into Central London. Ideal for professionals seeking quality and style.

properties.shortDescription: Spacious four-bedroom detached home with garage and large garden.
properties.description: A substantial four-bedroom detached residence offering ample space for a growing family, set on a generous plot of 1,800 sq ft. This impressive property boasts a large double garage and a sweeping driveway. Inside features two reception rooms, including a formal lounge with a fireplace and a separate dining room. The spacious kitchen includes a breakfast bar, utility room, and access to a vast rear garden laid to lawn. Upstairs are four double bedrooms and two bathrooms, including a master en-suite. While well-maintained, it offers fantastic potential for modernization. Located on Bromley High Street, it provides immediate access to top-rated schools, The Glades shopping center, and transport links, perfectly balancing suburban tranquility with urban convenience.

properties.shortDescription: Stylish one-bedroom city apartment near Baker Street tube station.
properties.description: Experience cosmopolitan living in this stylish one-bedroom apartment, perfectly positioned on historic Baker Street. Spanning a well-designed 600 sq ft, this residence is tailored for the modern professional. The interior features high ceilings, engineered oak flooring, and sash windows flooding the space with light. The open-plan living area includes a chic kitchen with smart home integration for lighting and heating. The double bedroom offers built-in storage, served by a luxury bathroom with marble finishes. Residents enjoy doorstep access to world-class dining, Regent's Park, and unbeatable transport connections via Baker Street tube. With a long lease and low service charges, this is an unmissable opportunity to own a pied-à-terre in one of London's most famous postcodes.

properties.shortDescription: Luxury five-bedroom villa with pool and private double garage.
properties.description: An exceptional five-bedroom luxury villa on Camden Road, renovated to create a unique urban sanctuary of over 3,500 sq ft. This masterpiece features a heated indoor pool, private gym, and cinema room. The ground floor offers a grand hall leading to three reception rooms blending period elegance with modern luxury. A bespoke chef's kitchen boasts a wine cellar and bi-fold doors opening to a secluded courtyard. The first-floor master suite includes dual dressing rooms and a spa-like en-suite. Four further double bedrooms and three additional bathrooms ensure ample space. With a private double garage, advanced security, and entertainment wiring throughout, this villa offers the ultimate in privacy and luxury for the discerning buyer.

properties.shortDescription: Renovated three-bedroom flat with balcony and shared garden access.
properties.description: This beautifully renovated three-bedroom flat offers comfort and convenience on Station Road, spanning a generous 1,100 sq ft. Thoughtfully updated to maximize light, it features a large living room with sliding doors opening onto a private, south-facing balcony with scenic views. There are two modern bathrooms, including a master en-suite, both finished with contemporary fixtures. The separate kitchen diner is fully equipped with high-gloss units. Residents benefit from exclusive access to a well-maintained shared garden. Located moments from Orpington station, this home is a commuter's dream with fast trains to London Bridge. Local shops, leisure centers, and parks are within easy walking distance, making this a fantastic opportunity for families or investors.

properties.shortDescription: Cozy two-bedroom character cottage near the local park.
properties.description: A delightful two-bedroom character cottage on desirable Manor Lane, offering 850 sq ft of cozy living space. This charming property retains original features including exposed timber beams, a brick-built fireplace with a log burner, and hardwood flooring. The ground floor comprises an inviting lounge, separate dining area, and a galley-style country kitchen with solid wood countertops leading to a quaint courtyard garden. Upstairs find two well-proportioned double bedrooms and a tastefully updated family bathroom with a roll-top bath. With proximity to local parks, excellent schools, and Bromley's vibrant town center, this cottage represents a fantastic opportunity for buyers looking for a home with personality and history in a peaceful yet connected location.
